Text.Name: LsXuanWu_Carve
Text.Desc: Statue of a Black Tortoise. Can be used to revive or summon Black Tortoise.

Text.Name: ZhenWuCarve
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Observe
Text.StoryBnts.0.Desc: Try to learn the construction method of this building.
Text.Desc: A sacred statue of Perfected Warrior Emperor for worship, with inviolable divine might and boundless blessings.

Text.Name: TurTleMonu
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Observe
Text.StoryBnts.0.Desc: Try to learn the construction method of this building.
Text.Desc: Legend has it that millennia ago, Yu the Great tamed Bixi the Turtle, using it to dredge, divert rivers and control floods. Its contributions are all recorded on this stele.

Text.Name: IncenseTripod
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Observe
Text.StoryBnts.0.Desc: Try to learn the construction method of this building.
Text.Desc: A Taoist cauldron used for burning incense sticks to calm nerves.

Text.Name: DragonIncense
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Worship
Text.StoryBnts.0.Desc: Attempt to worship with Dragon Incense.
Text.Desc: A miracle in the Southrock Palace that stands on the cliffs of the Wudang Mountains. One must climb on all fours to offer incense. One misstep will lead to a fall off the mountains.

Text.Name: RedWallDownLeft
Text.Desc: A wall unique to Wudang Sect. Though mighty and impressive, it cannot be used to create a room.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Observe
Text.StoryBnts.0.Desc: Try to learn the construction method of this building.

Text.Name: RedWallGate
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Observe

Text.Name: RedWallDrum
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Observe
Text.StoryBnts.0.Desc: Try to learn the construction method of this building.
Text.Desc: A decorative structure. It can affect the Five Elements of its surroundings based on its materials.

Text.Name: WuDangBigGate
Text.Desc: A majestic gate of Wudang Sect.

Text.Name: WuDangDivine
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Observe
Text.StoryBnts.0.Desc: Try to learn the construction method of this building.
Text.Desc: A structure unique to the Wudang Mountains that is engraved with the sacred title of Perfected Warrior Emperor.

Text.Name: WuDangJinDian
Text.Desc: A miraculous wonder that stands atop the mountain peak of Wudang Sect. Blessed by the divine might of Perfected Warrior Emperor, it contains the arcane secret of the ultimate Wudang skill to be learnt and practiced by cultivators lucky enough to find it.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Inspiration
Text.StoryBnts.0.Desc: Meditate on the heavenly ways dwelling within it.
